item.title: Images
item.description: Use markdown to display an image. ![Alt text](/media/image-1.jpg "Photo by Ales Krivec on Unsplash") Result: You can use image shortcode to insert an image which automatically generates additional five sizes of image for various display sizes. Example code: {{< image src="media/image-1.jpg" >}} Result: You can insert image with caption. Example code: {{< image src="media/image-1.jpg" title="Photo by Ales Krivec on Unsplash" >}} Result: Photo by Ales Krivec on Unsplash You can add lightbox="true" parameter to use lightbox plugin.
